website_summaries.verdict: Home8’s garage door system works best as part of the larger Home8 system. Other camera-friendly garage door controllers do more for your money.
pros: Home8’s smart garage door system offers reliable live streaming and works with Alexa and Google Assistant for voice commands
cons: The kit doesn’t include a sensor, so door status and specific open and close commands aren’t available
The Home8 app includes lots of nongarage menus and functions

customer_reviews.title: Monthly plan
customer_reviews.text: Overall it works ok. Picture quality is not great. It is black and white unless it’s really bright in the room. The reason I only give it 2 stars is it requires you after a trial period to purchase a monthly plan in order to see when motion was detected.
customer_reviews.author: Rho Rho

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a scam
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a scam. After a month, you require a subscription to view video. WHY, I own the equipment. DON'T buy. Better products are out there.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Malo

customer_reviews.title: Only one person can access the opener on the garage ...
customer_reviews.text: Only one person can access the opener on the garage unless you pay a monthly fee. If I had know that I would not have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S Hazelton

customer_reviews.title: App's interface is also pretty terrible.
customer_reviews.text: App takes a very long time to register your product, I had to keep tapping the phone to keep it from going to sleep while waiting for it to find/register the unit during setup. Took over 5 minutes. Also, when you tap the open/close button on the app, it doesn't always register. Usually takes about 2-3 tries for it to work. App's interface is also pretty terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Good garage door control. Video access not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to set up. Connection is great if I'm home but for some reason it won't show me current video when I'm away. I don't have premium service, so I can't view recorded video but I can still view snapshots and can control my garage opener. Good thing I have Arlo cameras located in such a way that I can see my garage door. I was hoping to be able to replace one of them with the Home 8 but am disappointed that I cannot.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I got very scared and looked for a good device reading all reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought this security system for my garage because I came late at night and didn’t realize I had left the door opened. I got very scared and looked for a good device reading all reviews. It was very easy to install and Im very happy looking at my garage door when not sure if I closed. The best part is that I can ck it from anywhere from my iPhone. I’m waiting to tested from Europe next month. I highly recommend Home8.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I like I can monitor to see if my garage door is open or closed. The camera is fair. I don't like you have to pay so much for cloud storage. I refuse to pay what they are asking so I don't use the video storage. Other than that I am happy with the product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Edward L Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend. Installation was difficult
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Would not recommend. Installation was difficult, picture quality once I did have it installed was poor and the garage door feature just never bothered to sync with the app or my home network.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I also like the fact that you can expand this system and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Never can remember if we closed the garage door, now we can check without having to drive back home. And the app has the option to close the door (if you by chance left it open). I also like the fact that you can expand this system and may look into additional cameras for the front door to see who is knocking.
customer_reviews.author: M.Sally

customer_reviews.title: works perfect, I needed a webcam/opener for my non intelicode ...
customer_reviews.text: works perfect, I needed a webcam/opener for my non intelicode garage door opener, this fit the bill perfectly I wired the opener device right into my garage door motor( a old screw type opener) and everything only took about 5 mins to link to the sender. I no longer have to fear that I left my door open after I went to work
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: Great little security system
customer_reviews.text: Great little security system. I've since upgraded to add more components. Simple to use and works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and simple to install
customer_reviews.text: Great little device and very easy to install. Like the idea of the expandability of this setup.
customer_reviews.author: JLSwany

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Rip off Does not worth what you pay Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Good system
customer_reviews.text: Works well. A little challenging to hook up, although worth it, seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Peppinger

customer_reviews.title: ... the starter kit system and had it is working like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I integrated it with the starter kit system and had it is working like a charm. Easy installment, easy instruction to follow.
customer_reviews.author: sweetdee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad for Father’s Day because they travel a lot. He loved it so much that he bought additional cameras to go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works as advertised. Setup was very simple and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Eberly

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install & great features. Now we can be sure the garage door is closed.
customer_reviews.author: bfort

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. I installed in five minutes
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I installed in five minutes. Basic "Plug and Pray" worked. I didn't mount the button and just set it on top of the garage door opener. I was also able to wire the button onto the same 2 wires as my existing button (which has a light control). The next day a contractor came by with some rock samples for my yard and I remotely opened the garage, watched on the video as he set them in the garage, then closed when finished. He thinks I'm a genius computer wizard or something and is slightly scared of me, lol. Thanks Home8!
customer_reviews.author: Bzy

customer_reviews.title: You can only do this with one smart phone unless you want to pay them $120
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this unit and it is a scam! It sends a signal to your garage to open or close it. You can only do this with one smart phone unless you want to pay them $120.00 per year for the press of a button!!!! Do not buy this unit unless you want to get hit with a very unfair fee! I do not recommend it period! and im very upset after spending a few hours trying to figure out how it works with the poor directions.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: No more calling my neighbors
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I need . No more calling my neighbors to verify that I closed the garage door!
customer_reviews.author: WhineLover

customer_reviews.title: great for home and when you forget your remote in ...
customer_reviews.text: great for home and when you forget your remote in side you can open your garage from any were and the camera keeps you inform if any thing moves or if the door was open with out you knowing and alerts you plus its plug and play so easy to setup
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It work pic quality is not the best does not always log into system
customer_reviews.text: It work pic quality is not the best does not always log into system
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Off to a bad start when a "security" product doesn't allow symbols in their passwords.  Cannot perform intermediate stops :(
customer_reviews.text: When security companies don't follow VERY old best practices, that is not a good first display of competence. Working well for FULL opens and closes, but I was pretty disappointed that after pressing the "perform action" you are blocked from quickly performing it again (it makes you wait a certain time period before the action can be performed again). I was hoping to open it up a crack for the cat, and then pause it before it was wide open so humans couldn't fit through. This arbitrary restriction is also a safety issue, since you cannot stop a started action.
customer_reviews.author: dleon

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product. Just a hair short of "excellent"
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. Just a hair short of "excellent". Needs better night vision. The IR is not strong enough for total darkness. But that's only a 1 star problem. It's easy and does it's job well. Totally removes that weird feeling when you get 8 miles from home and wonder "did I or didn't I".
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: hard to use  returned
customer_reviews.text: had to be hooked right to the router so couldn't place it in the area I needed to view never did figure out how to hook up 2nd camera returned everything
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: After one month you’re required to buy a subscription in ...
customer_reviews.text: After one month you’re required to buy a subscription in order to have more than one authorized user. The subscription costs $4.99 for one user or $9.99 per month for premium which I think has unlimited users. That was not disclosed in the description. Total scam!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Product is good and pretty simple to install. However the camera quality is not all that great especially when there's no light (during night time). The camera is only a 640x480.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Crazy complicated setup
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst and most frustrating smart home system I have ever tried. They won't connect wirelessly or bluetooth. They have to be hardwired in. And even then you get the prompt "device offline." Then it starts everything completely over again. I wish that I had bought this from a store so I could return this garbage but my garage door people installed it and they are long gone now.
customer_reviews.author: pstaten

customer_reviews.title: The unit itself is useless without the $ub$cription
customer_reviews.text: I had this unit for over a year now. I'd say after 3 months of used, it starts giving a false alarm (motion detected??) at least once a month (average ). Casper the friendly ghost maybe?? The unit itself is useless without the $ub$cription! It only takes still picture once the sensor(s) are triggered.
customer_reviews.author: E. QuPal

customer_reviews.title: Overall is good
customer_reviews.text: The system is very easy to setup and link well with my home WiFi router. Camera performance at the same as most of the 720p similar products. But the view angle of this camera is poor and night vision is not very good. Overall for this product is very good in quality. Pro: easy setting, good quality Cons: Cable are not long enough for my home, normal performance of camera, app interface is not very friendly
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup but expansion very costly
customer_reviews.text: Unit was easy to setup. Time will tell if it is durable. The problem is finding additional cameras. 1 additional camera cost over $60 on Amazon and I bought this on sale just a little over that. So expansion could be a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Tempest

customer_reviews.title: Works great and just as described
customer_reviews.text: Works great and just as described. I have it in my garage and like the fact that I can bring it up on my phone at anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Durand

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ease to install and ease use. Only cons is doesn't support Apple HomeKit.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky Chu

customer_reviews.title: Works as instructed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and work as described... still need to see how video works after free subscription expires ...
customer_reviews.author: A

product_meta.title: Home8 ActionView GarageShield Garage Door Control Relay System, Monitors/Controls Garage Door from Smartphone with Free Basic Service, Alexa Integration & Works with Most Garage Door Openers
product_meta.description: Style:GarageShieldLeft your garage door open? We got you covered. This Home8 ActionView GarageShield Garage Door Control Relay System is easy to install. Operate your existing garage door via your smartphone. Enjoy intuitive supervisory control and ultra-secure video privacy. Visually verify if you’ve left your garage door open accidentally once you’ve driven away. What’s in the box: 1x plug-n-play hub - Manages your devices and provides wireless access to the Home8 cloud, 1x Wi-Fi camera, 1x garage door opener relay - Allows you to open and close your garage door right from your smartphone. Your Wi-Fi signal strength depends on environmental factors such as walls, metal, radio interference and more. Rearranging the placement of your gateway may give a you stronger signal to your devices. You can also purchase our "Wi-Fi Range Extender" to extend the range of devices connected to your Home8 gateway.For garage door compatibility, Amazon Alexa Integration, premium service plan, and other information, please kindly visit our home8alarm official website.
feature_bullets: #1 ActionView Video-Verified Alarm system. Open and close the garage door remotely from your smartphone
Visually verify that you do not accidentally leave your garage door open when you're away
Motion detection feature, which can trigger an event, notify you on your smartphone via push notification, and proceed with an event recording of 30 seconds
Easy to install. No contracts. Video monitoring and garage door controlling is free under basic service. *Additional features are available in the premium service plan

Includes 1x plug-n-play hub, 1x Wi-Fi camera featuring night vision mode and motion detection, 1x garage door opener relay. Expandability: Addon new devices to fit your specific needs in security, video, automation, safety, and care. *Please check compatibility as not all devices function on the same wireless protocol

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars49 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
